text: Pir Katpar railway station (, ) is located in Pir Katpar village, Khairpur District of Sindh province of the Pakistan. ==See also== * List of railway stations in Pakistan * Pakistan Railways ==References== ==External links== * Official Web Site of Pakistan Railways Category:Railway stations in Khairpur District Category:Railway stations on Karachi–Peshawar Line (ML 1)
title: Pir Katpar railway station
